name: Burg_295
culture_notes: Speaks Coastal Tongues dialect with nautical idioms
Diet centered on salted fish and seaweed preserves
Ritual calendar tied to tides and ancestral offerings
constraints: Ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents
No instant resurrection or long-range mind control
notes: Near-medieval to early-industrial tech with localized ritual craft
Navigational auguries used but seamanship still required
